docs.lead_paragraph:
Anyone who has cared for a baby knows that it’s easy to become preoccupied with what goes in one end — with what you feed her and how — and to regard what comes out the other end with a kind of fascination, as if the diaper contained messages and auguries.
 
What you feed a baby is a reflection of your beliefs and family traditions, your cultural background and life situation. But it also means considering the advice of a good many experts, from pediatricians to nutritionists to allergists.

docs.abstract: Eating walnuts may reduce the risk for Type 2 diabetes in women, a large new study concludes.
docs.snippet: Eating walnuts may reduce the risk for Type 2 diabetes in women, a large new study concludes.

docs.lead_paragraph: DAY--Mansoor B. Day, 91, of New York, NY passed away at 1:30am on Saturday, April 6. Born on November 2, 1921 in Babol, Iran, he emigrated to the United States where he practiced as an anesthesiologist for 45 years at the New York University Medical Center. He was a scientist and a scholar, a nutrition and health advocate and pioneer far ahead of his time, a patriot, and fiercely devoted to his family and patients. He is survived by his loving wife of 53 years, Sheila Shekoofeh Day, his son, Charles Day (Amy Carron Day), his daughter, Dr. Doris Day (Dr. Kambiz Michael Ghalili), countless nieces and nephews who looked to him for guidance and support, and his grandchildren, the delights of his life, Sabrina Ghalili, Andrew Ghalili, Alexander Day, and Juliet Day.

docs.lead_paragraph: When shoppers buy two Clarins items at Macy’s, Clarins will donate $1 to an antihunger group, the equivalent of paying for 10 school meals.

headline.seo: Gift With Purchase With a Cause From Clarins, Macy’s and Feed Project
headline.main: A Cosmetics Freebie With a Cause
headline.print_headline: A Cosmetics Freebie With a Cause

docs.abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column notes that cosmetics company Clarins will put novel twist on traditional gift-with-purchase promotions by donating $1 to antihunger charity when consumers purchase their products at Macy's.
docs.snippet: When shoppers buy two Clarins items at Macy’s, Clarins will donate $1 to an antihunger group, the equivalent of paying for 10 school meals.
